title: 97/94/EC: Commission Decision of 8 January 1997 concerning measures which are necessary for the implementation of certification rules regarding certain animal products (Text with EEA relevance)
header:
COMMISSION DECISION of 8 January 1997 concerning measures which are necessary for the implementation of certification rules regarding certain animal products (Text with EEA relevance) (97/94/EC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: Member States may authorize imports into the Community of products covered by the certificates laid down in the decisions listed in the Annex, on the basis of certificates established by national rules in force on 31 December 1996 for a limited period.
The period mentioned in Article 1 shall expire on 1 April 1997 for products covered by certificates laid down in the decision listed in the Annex.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 8 January 1997.
For the Commission
Franz FISCHLER
